title: Fluent single page application in 2 mins
author: sgoran
content: readme.md micro client side single page library: http://micro-js.comgoal is use fast improve ux fragment application without need learn angular, react etc.installing$ npm install micro-spa by embedding directly page<script src="https://unpkg.com/micro-spa@latest"></script>running examples run examples the following install dev dependencies run example express server:$ git clone https://github.com/sgoran/micro.git$ cd micro/examples/blog$ npm install$ cd micro/examples/blog$ npm start$ open http://localhost:8080simple api micro({ config: { container: '#app', tpldir: '/tpl', enteranimation: 'fadein' }, router: [{ match: '/', title: 'home page', src: "home.html" },{ match: '/example', title: 'example page', src: "examples.html" }] });
